para.verbatim:
Mixin class providing async context manager functionality via a generator-based implementation.
This class allows you to implement a context manager via :meth:`__asynccontextmanager__`. The mechanics are meant to mirror those of :func:`@asynccontextmanager <contextlib.asynccontextmanager>`.
.. note:: Classes using this mix-in are not reentrant as context managers, meaning that once you enter it, you can't re-enter before first exiting it.
.. seealso:: :doc:`contextmanagers`
